features.name: Agentic Workflow Editor
features.description: Visual editor for building agentic workflows with LLM, tool, memory, and agent nodes.

features.name: Custom Node Types
features.description: Support for agentic, tool, model, memory, input, and output nodes.

features.name: Dynamic Tool Registry
features.description: Frontend and backend support for dynamic tool selection and configuration (tavily_search, multiply, send_email, post_to_slack).

features.name: Streaming Agent Execution
features.description: Backend endpoint /execute-agent streams agentic workflow execution results to the frontend.

features.name: Credential Management
features.description: APIs and UI for managing credentials for LLMs, tools, and memory backends.

features.name: Email and Slack Tool Integration
features.description: Backend tools for sending email (via SMTP) and posting to Slack (dummy, can be extended).

features.name: Web Search Tool Integration
features.description: Backend tool for Tavily web search, with frontend config.

features.name: Math Tool Integration
features.description: Backend tool for multiplying two numbers, with frontend config.
